title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: I have been trying to get through to customer care on the app for over 72 hours and had no reply. They usually reply within an hour is anyone else having this problem? I have tried contacting them on the chat online too and also no reply for over 24 hours.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 01, 2023, 01:10:58 PMThey usually reply within an hour is anyone else having this problem?I'm not a crypto.com user, so I don't know whether crypto.com is currently experiencing problems with their support or not. Wouldn't it be better if you asked questions about this in their native community, of course you would get relevant answers.Official Crypto.com CommunitiesNot only a global community, they even have communities for local users, so you can communicate well using your native language, I hope this helps you.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Have you tried to check this out OP?https://help.crypto.com/en/Or on the website? On the lower right? I think you could chat there directly.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: They are probably overwhelmed but 72 hours is a lot of time to respond. Have you tried their email contact@crypto.com? You can also try their social media pages. If you want to be more aggressive in getting their attention then you can post in review sites like trustpilot https://www.trustpilot.com/review/crypto.com It seems they have a bot responding there.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: I have tried the website chat also and had no reply for almost 48 hours now. It is strange as they are usually very good with the customer service. I may have to try their community forum see if I can get any update. I sent them an email yesterday and they acknowledged it but no reply yet

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Did they have any Ann thread here to contact their representatives? Is been long I used this exchange to trade, I don't know if could even remember my login details anymore. I have always seen that exchange as a good one but if you could lodge a complaint like this then it's better to stay away from that exchange because what customers like is to get help when needed otherwise it will be hard to reach them to fixed any issues that may arise later or sooner.

comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 01, 2023, 01:10:58 PMI have been trying to get through to customer care on the app for over 72 hours and had no reply. They usually reply within an hour is anyone else having this problem? I have tried contacting them on the chat online too and also no reply for over 24 hours. No one's gonna help you here because they don't have a forum representative. And that's why your only hope is go get them again and keep on following up your concern.So, you contact them again and again because the ticket might have been covered up by other concerns that are also doing the same thing as you and that's what you need to do.I haven't used them and yeah, not having any answer for 24 hours is something odd for a known crypto exchange.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: I haven't used Crypto.com as an exchanger and I don't have any experience with their support. But based on my familiarity and experience with similar platforms, they typically offer prompt and quick customer service. Take Binance or Kraken, for example in case of any issues, they rapidly guide you to the relevant department to fix your issue.Considering your situation and the platform having a good reputation, it's likely that they are encountering a high volume of support messages related to a specific issue and with the end of year maybe many of their workers are in leave. I recommend reaching out to them via email or by opening a support ticket. Beside that, explore their community on Telegram or Discord for potential assistance and if they encountering the same issue.

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: There are a few possible scenarios. They have been overwhelmed by the customer request or their is some work going on with their management team or you are trying to contact them through the wrong channel. What ever the case, you can try to get their attention in their twitter handle if they are not giving any response to your support request. If their have been any problem with the whole exchange their have been an update in their social media. So i am not seeing any issue to be concerned about right now.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Update with this. I first contacted them 29th November and got a reply 2nd December but they only answered half my query. I then asked them to confirm the rest of my query on the same day and i have still not had a reply 5 days later. I have been using the crypto.com app for over a year and up till this the longest i ever had to wait for a reply was 3 hours so not sure what is happening here and why they are struggling to reply. Anyone else have this problem? If this is sign of what to come when things get busy, bull run is going to be a nightmare.
